Upcoming Events

Spartan Robotics Spaghetti Dinner and Silent Auction - Saturday, November 17, 2018

Location: Central United Methodist Church, Salem, VA 24153

Come see the robot and support Spartan Robotics Team to help with travel, food, and lodging expenses for this upcoming season.

Dinner includes: spaghetti, garlic bread, salad, drink & dessert.
Adults: $8.00, Children (6 to 12): $5.00, Children 5 and under: FREE.
